cause.description:
hay every one if you live in Highland Park we need you support...since the fire deptment is a volunteer orgnization we need the people we serve to support us...so please any donation and support would be great! thank you for ur support
P.S we need you! come join us keeping our town safe and fire free!
1. help ur towns fire dept
2. we need the support
3. need more vol. ffs!
cause.name: Highland Park Volunteer Fire Dept.
